content:
Is there a coding system for Chest CT that I should be using ? Would I use a SNOMED code in this example?

"answerOption": [
    {
        "valueCoding": {
        "code": "Chest CT",
        "display": "Chest CT",
        "system": "http://Sunquest.info/fhir/value"
    }
},
SNOMED does have a code for that, yes. What codes you choose to use depend on how you want to use the data once extracted from the Questionnaire.
